overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a presence on Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research related to social media, disinformation, and computational social science. His largest audience is on LinkedIn, but he is active across all three platforms. His content generates consistent engagement, with LinkedIn posts attracting the most likes and comments.

contentThemes.description: Posts announcing new research, publications, and grants related to social media analysis and disinformation.
Posts advertising research positions and opportunities for students and postdoctoral researchers.
Posts related to upcoming conferences and presentations, showcasing Fabio's expertise and research.
Posts announcing new versions of software or tools developed by the team, like CooRnet.

recommendations: Diversify content formats to include images and videos to potentially increase engagement.
Engage more actively with comments and replies to foster a stronger community.
Use platform-specific hashtags to increase discoverability.
Cross-promote content across different platforms to reach a wider audience.
Experiment with posting times to identify optimal engagement windows for each platform.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky shows strong engagement through reposts, indicating a potential for sharing research-related findings and engaging a broader audience interested in coordinated inauthentic behavior.
platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon engagement is lower compared to other platforms. Experiment with different content types and posting times to see if engagement can be increased.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn generates the highest engagement through likes and comments. Continue posting professional updates and job opportunities to maintain this audience.
